Truly as good as it gets.  I had the wine pairing and it was perfect.  In this country Cava usually is a garbage sweet throwaway.  Here it's amazing.  My wife has a limited diet (fish and vegetables).  Not only did they accommodate they replaced the choices with masterpieces that were as good as the original selections which I enjoyed.  The service couldn't be better.  The information on the wine choices was spot on.  Don't miss it if you go to Barcelona.
